title: NITI Aayog to prepare roadmap on 'energy transition' in November
description: NITI Aayog, under CEO BVR Subrahmanyam, is set to present a roadmap for India's green energy transition aimed at achieving net zero carbon emissions by 2070. The report, due next month, will also focus on transitioning hard-to-abate industries and enhancing circularity in various sectors.
